price: 72. Mpe oyo akomona awa na mokili te, akomonaka mpe te o mokolo mwa suka, тре akozalaka na libunga linene.
arabic: وَمَن كَانَ فِي هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَعۡمَىٰ فَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waman kāna fī hādhihi aʿmā fahuwa fī al-ākhirati aʿmā wa-aḍallu sabīlan
